issue.title: Game starts automatically 5 seconds after player is connected

content.raw:
Wow, I didn't realize there was a Wiki. Perhaps a link to it in the Readme wouldn't hurt, for other people who are as blind as me. :)

- The game starting automatically was unexpected to me because I'm used to SimSpark, where the game has to be started manually (as far as I know). I guess there's a more general question here - is this plugin supposed to behave exactly like `rcssserver3d`, apart from differences in phyiscs? See also #18.
- It is **not** possible to insert an agent during `play` in Gazebo, but it is in SimSpark.
content.html:
Wow, I didn't realize there was a Wiki. Perhaps a link to it in the Readme wouldn't hurt, for other people who are as blind as me. :)

  • The game starting automatically was unexpected to me because I'm used to SimSpark, where the game has to be started manually (as far as I know). I guess there's a more general question here - is this plugin supposed to behave exactly like rcssserver3d, apart from differences in phyiscs? See also #18.
  • It is not possible to insert an agent during play in Gazebo, but it is in SimSpark.
